info.help_text:
Rejected calls observation report. Rejected calls are service requests, not only calls.

The DX 200/ATCA system contains load control mechanisms which include message queue observation and access window method.

Ticket service is the software that implements the access window method. The clients of the ticket service are hands of a process family.

Rejected calls observation requires that one of the computer units CCSU, TGSU, SIGU CASU, PAU, BSU, BDCU, GSU or GISU is under observation.

In the Open MSS, which is based on the ATCA hardware, the only possible signaling unit type is the Generic Signaling Unit (GISU).

Object levels:
PLMN->MSC->UNIT->TICKETSERV

Measurements:
M114: Rejected calls observation measurement
